author: Jay Beddow
comment: It seems I have to add the location manually. I would much rather the complication updated to my current location automatically.    Update 30th Jan  I see developer responded to my review feedback quickly but not to this question I raised by email.   I still have the same issue. I expect when I arrive in the next city, in this case Los Angeles, the wear weather app will continue to show the city I was in and not update itself to the location of my " current location"   I do not want to manually define a location or intervine, I simply want the app to show me the weather of my current location.   Can you confirm this is possible? In which case I am doing something wrong and need help, or this is a working as designed.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: We will release a solution to your request in one of our next upgrades! Thank you very much for reaching out.

author: kay kay
comment: I purchased the full version of this app and I recently bought a new phone and now I lost the version that I purchased I only have the standard i would have gave it no stars because of that.......so now money is lost

author: Greg Perryman
comment: Not the best weather app on my watch it shows that it's 32°F when it's actually 16°F. I'll give it 5 ☆ when this issue is resolved. Until then 3☆ is the best I'll give.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback, we will look into this issue.

author: BJ Kouba
comment: glitchy. Does not work

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Please send your bug report to support@appfour.com. Thank you in advance.

author: Smith Johnson
comment: You want me to pay the upgrade so I can change weather settings from Celsius to farenheit?? Good luck no wonder your rating is so low lol. Uninstalling

author: matt clarke
comment: At first fantastic app but now won't work on my casio wsd f20. Tried reinstalling but it just sits loading and never shows the weather page. Paid for the full app so this is very disappointing.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Hi Matt, thank you for the feedback. Please check out the next version and let us know your issues got fixed. (support@appfour.com)

author: Thomas Huggins
comment: Says free but it's not really.  Can't switch to Fahrenheit without it begging for $3.  Garbage app!

author: glenford simon
comment: From ever since this app first came out it had a metric problem don't understand European metric system when you change it to imperial whatever that means it stay the same way nothing has changed if not next two weeks I'm deleting it. It's more now for people who understand European weather metric system can you please add the metric system that we all fimiliar with please it been a while since it been on one metric system.😫

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: If the changes in settings are not taken even after restarting your smartwatch, please send an email to support@appfour.com. So far we where not aware of this issue.

author: Kev Gilder
comment: Doesn't work. Doesn't connect to my watch. Uninstalling.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Please send your bug report with watch and phone specifics to support@appfour.com so we can investigate your issue. Thank you.

author: Bryce G
comment: Highly inaccurate. Says it''s 92°F in my home town when it's actually 76°F. The high today was 86°F, it never even got into the 90s. I don't know where this app gets it's weather, but it needs to change providers. Aside from that, the app looks and functions great, with a good amount of information, as I would expect from appfour.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback, Bryce, we will look into this issue.

author: Josh Landis
comment: Useless in the US. Paywalling your most basic feature is an IMMEDIATE turn off and I'll be uninstalling this. Looked good from the 5 seconds I used it.

author: Robert Spraggs
comment: Nice layout on polar m800 watch but weather forecast very inaccurate!! Also doesn't seem to have current location setting,

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Hi Robert, please help us figuring out what is not working well by contacting support@appfour.com.

author: David Horine
comment: Needs more. It's a very bare bone weather app. I also recommend moving the temperature below the icon on the current temperature.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback, David.

author: Dan Coleman
comment: I have paid for the full app but have yet to discover how to change the settings to Celsius and mph having updated them both on the phone and the watch at the same time and separately re booting in between. Very basic information compared to other applications that are available, need to be able to select an hourly view of each day .

author: Arnold Chan
comment: I Paid for full version, at first really rubbish,after reinstall at the phone and manual install at the watch,function good as claim...After a while,corrupt again,can't add new location and Apps at phone turn off automatically...

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: If your issues are persisting please contact support@appfour.com.

author: Felicia McGraw
comment: If you want anything other than metric units, you have to pay. That's not right. It should be in the description that this is the free version and show what it does for free if that's the case. Uninstalling and looking for better one.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content:
The description says exactly what you get. ;) 
"Full version features:
- Add more than one city
- Customizable units
- Customizable notifications"

author: Diana Parsons
comment: App won't display imperial units of temp. Stays in metric 4/5 update from last week resolved issue of temp not appearing in imperial units. Nice job developers!

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: This bug was fixed and will be online with the new version! Thank you for your report.

author: Moshiur Rahman Montu Sardar
comment: Montu Sardar Blog

Mar 29/30 update corrects metric/imperial units issue as well as adding the option for settings onto the wearable. (Verizon LG V20 with Fossil Q Founder) Thanks appfour, this entire suite of Wear apps is great! 👍

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback! :)

author: Mickey W
comment: Will not connect to my S7. Followed instructions multiple times and still shows disconnected.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Please contact support@appfour.com for assistance. Thank you.

author: Sheree Goldstein
comment: Even with the latest update, Imperial units are still incorrect.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Could you please send us a screenshot or description to support@appfour.com what exactly is not working. Thank you very much in advance.

author: Zachary Beland
comment: Great weather app for wear. I can see detailed forecasts for specific days and I love the ability of multiple locations.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: This issue should be fixed now. Please test! If you have any further questions, suggestions or feedback please feel free to contact support@appfour.com.

author: Imrich IVAN
comment: Amazing app, needed one un- and reinstall, but after that works like a charm. Finally one weather app which does the job! Thank you again. Nice thing would be if when disconnected from the mobile the watch could show the already downloaded weather forecast.

author: Michael Ibarra
comment: Very nice but needs a little work will not display in U S Fahrenheit and displays time in 24 hour  instead of 12 hour

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Hi Michael, this should work now. Please test!

author: Patricia Lange
comment: Love it!

Quite useful but seems to drain watch battery rapidly. Never had my watch go to zero battery by end of day but since installing this it does. Now uninstalled and battery life back to normal (Sony Smartwatch 3)

author: Andrew Reynolds
comment: I live in Columbia, MO (purchased it while out of town and that town showed up immediately). When I type in Columbia, MO I get nothing. When I type Columbia I get all sorts of results for Columbia, US but NO idea which state each of those Columbia's are in.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Thank you for this feedback. We will look into this issue.

author: Kathy Degan
comment: Will not load in lg urbane, just keeps trying to but never does.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Please contact support@appfour.com for help or refund. Thank you.

author: James Scherber
comment: App is showing Sam Francisco F temp that is 18 degrees higher than it is and that there are thunder storms in San Francisco without a cloud in the sky. Fail.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: We will look into this, thank you for your report.

comment: Glitchy and can only show weather in Celsius

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: You can set the temperature to F in the settings. If you need assistance feel free to contact support@appfour.com.

author: MYRICK JOHNS
comment: It does not work with my Samsung Gear S smart watch 😢

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: We only support Android Wear smartwatches. If you purchased the full version contact our support. support@appfour.com.

author: Trevor Charles Herrera
comment: okay
